Articles.Content:
I am brand new to the forums, but I've been playing KSP since about .20 and I've now decided to join the forums.

Ok after realizing how bland this post is, going to add some info.

21 year old father of 1 and married, nationally registered EMT, firefighter student, in the National Guard, and working as an EMT, Public Corrections officer, and part time Grammar ..... I found out about KSP after finishing basic training in 2012. Been playing it off and on since then. I am looking forward to seeing what these forums has to offer and what I can contribute to them as well.

Edited July 27, 2014 by Mr.Feather

Welcome to the forums! Hope you enjoy your stay. Sounds like you really are a people helper kinda guy! EMT, firefighter student, national guard. You need to make your way down to the questions forum to help out! Haha always need help down there. Seirously though, glad you enjoy the game, hope you continue to enjoy it, need help with anything feel free to ask!
